languages.text:
Зверь на колено упал, и на серых устах,
Вдруг заиграла улыбка коварства и страха".

To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."
languages.original_text:
Зверь на колено упал, и на серых устах,
Вдруг заиграла улыбка коварства и страха".

traits.locale_text:
To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

Зверь на колено упал, и на серых устах,
Вдруг заиграла улыбка коварства и страха".

To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

languages.text:
獣は膝から崩れ落ち
突然、灰色の唇に
狡猾さと恐怖に満ちた
笑みを浮かべた」
languages.original_text:
To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

traits.locale_text:
獣は膝から崩れ落ち
突然、灰色の唇に
狡猾さと恐怖に満ちた
笑みを浮かべた」

languages.text:
“野兽跪倒在地，
突然之间，
他灰白的嘴唇上，
浮现诡诈与恐惧的笑容。”
languages.original_text:
To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

traits.locale_text:
“野兽跪倒在地，
突然之间，
他灰白的嘴唇上，
浮现诡诈与恐惧的笑容。”

languages.text:
« À genoux la bête tomba
et ses lèvres grises
s'étirèrent soudainement
en un sourire de ruse
et de peur. »
languages.original_text:
To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

traits.locale_text:
« À genoux la bête tomba
et ses lèvres grises
s'étirèrent soudainement
en un sourire de ruse
et de peur. »

languages.text:
«De rodillas cayó la bestia doblegada,
y de repente en sus labios de ceniza
afloró una sonrisa
de miedo y picardía».
languages.original_text:
To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

traits.locale_text:
«De rodillas cayó la bestia doblegada,
y de repente en sus labios de ceniza
afloró una sonrisa
de miedo y picardía».

languages.text:
Auf die Knie das Untier fiel,
und plötzlich um seine grauen Lippen
ein Lächeln spielte
von Tücke und Furcht."
languages.original_text:
To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

traits.locale_text:
Auf die Knie das Untier fiel,
und plötzlich um seine grauen Lippen
ein Lächeln spielte
von Tücke und Furcht."

languages.text:
Yıkıldı canavar, dizlerinin üzerine.
Gri dudaklarında aniden
Kurnazlık ve korkuyla dolu
Bir gülümseme yeşerdi."
languages.original_text:
To his knees the beast fell,
and suddenly about his grey lips,
a smile played
of guile and fear."

traits.locale_text:
Canavar yıkıldı dizlerinin üzerinde
ve aniden gri dudaklarında,
kurnaz ve korkuyla dolu
bir gülümseme yeşerdi."
